data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Jervis Bay Territory access to a Bible in their own language.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Jervis Bay Territory, Australia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 56 believers in Jervis Bay Territory to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 343 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Over 36.31 percent of the people of Jervis Bay Territory are far from Jesus.
Spirit, teach the 56 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Burmese people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Burmese people.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 56 believers in Jervis Bay Territory, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Jervis Bay Territory.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of Jervis Bay Territory, Australia has a population of 400.

We estimate Jervis Bay Territory has 56 people who might know Jesus, 198 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 145 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Jervis Bay Territory, Australia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
